alert.note: Alert for Fremont County Including Canon City, Howard, Texas Creek; Southern Front Range Including Sangre De Cristo Mountains, Wet Mountains, La Veta Pass; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 19 at 7:21PM MDT until April 19 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 9 PM this evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221, 222, and 224 through 237 which includes the San Luis Valley, the Sangre de Cristo an Wet Mountains, Fremont and Teller Counties, and all of the eastern plains... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued from noon to 8 PM Wednesday afternoon and evening for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 221...222...and 224 through 229... which includes the San Luis valley, the Sangre De Cristos and Wet Mountains, Fremont, Teller, El Paso, Pueblo and Huerfano counties... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...222 AND 225... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...222 AND 225... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221...222 and 225. * Winds...For the rest of this evening and for tomorrow...West 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * Timing...This evening until 9 PM. For Wednesday, noon until 8 PM. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
